column4: hi, i've installed for the first time an ubuntu7.10 (server) wiyhout gui, can you suggest me the right command to mount and explore an usb-pen-drive using the shall ?
not sure if the server edition has hal hotplug etc.... but you can try pmount /dev/xxxx replacing xxxx with the correct device
if the server does not have pmount uso mount -t auto/dev/xxxx  /mount/point
